## ImageOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ImageOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bits](./text-canvas.imageopts.bits.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of bits/pixel in source image (only grayscale supported) |
|  [chars](./text-canvas.imageopts.chars.md) | <code>NumOrString[]</code> | Target characters in order of increasing brightness (assuming white text on black bg). |
|  [format](./text-canvas.imageopts.format.md) | <code>number</code> | Format to apply to all chars. |
|  [gamma](./text-canvas.imageopts.gamma.md) | <code>number</code> | Gamma correction value / exponent. All source pixel values will be raised by this exponent. |
|  [invert](./text-canvas.imageopts.invert.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If true, uses inverted pixel values. |
